DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFCASE : RETAIL AND RESTAURANTS
DOC.TEXT: CKE Tries Picante Grill : CKE Restaurants Inc. , parent company of the Carl ' s Jr . chain , also is looking_to the future with Picante Grill , a Mexican-style fast-food restaurant . The first Picante Grill opened recently inside a Carl ' s Jr . restaurant in Orange . The location offers both Carl ' s Jr . regular fare and Mexican-style fast food . The company , based in Anaheim , hasn ' t said yet how many of the dual-use restaurants it will open .
